name: backend
description: Python backend for the Electron React Python Template

scripts.dev: cross-env FRONTEND_PORT=5173 BACKEND_PORT=8001 uv run uvicorn main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8001 --reload
scripts.build: cross-env PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 uv run pyinstaller main.py --onedir --name backend_main --distpath dist --noconfirm --clean
